name: Ikon
description: Ikonshop is building the next frontier of eCommerce powered by crypto. Our platform enables merchants to sell physical and digital products directly to global buyers with seamless cryptocurrency payments, reducing reliance on traditional payment systems. y leveraging Solanaâ€™s speed and low fees, we provide fast, secure, and borderless transactions.
